Consent to Follow-Ups

Your well-being remains important to us even after your treatment. We would be pleased if you allow us to stay in touch. Your feedback helps us continuously improve the quality of our care. I consent to being contacted by Charité for follow-up surveys. I can revoke this consent at any time without giving reasons.
